content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max Müller, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I understand that you are interested in renting it, but I am afraid that I cannot accept your offer. The apartment is quite small at 25 square meters, and I am looking for a higher rental price to maximize my gains. I would be happy to discuss further if you can offer a higher price.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I understand that this is a small apartment. However, I am willing to negotiate on the rental price. Can you tell me what you are looking for?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I am looking for a rental price that reflects the value of the apartment and my desire to maximize my gains. I am open to discussing the rental price with you, but I am not willing to accept a lower price than what I believe the apartment is worth.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand. I am willing to negotiate on the rental price. Can you give me a price that you are looking for?

I am willing to accept a rental price of 800 Euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I see, Max Müller. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I am afraid that I cannot accept your offer of 800 Euros per month. The apartment is quite small at 25 square meters, and I believe it is worth more than that. I would be willing to discuss further if you are open to offering a higher rental price.
name: Heinrich Heine
